Keywords: Armor , Celebrity , Latveria , Mystical , Ruler
Real Name: Victor Von Doom
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Hindering. This character can move through Blocking terrain. Immediately after movement resolves, destroy all Blocking terrain moved through.
THE MANY FACES OF DOOM:: At the beginning of the game, you may choose a starting line of equal points on a character from your sideline that also has this trait. If you do, replace this character with the chosen character.
ENDING THE REVOLUTION:: If an opponent's force has more characters than your force, opposing characters can't generate bystanders.
YOU CAN'T OUTRUN DOOM!: Charge, but doesn't halve speed.
DOOM LAUGHS AT YOUR FEEBLE ATTACKS!: Invulnerability. Opposing characters attacking Lord Doom modify attack and damage -1.
Trade Lord Doom Want Lord Doom

February 16, 2021
Goop
Your "many faces" call in if your opponent is utilizing some sort of bystander generation. Its a melee Doom with a long charge busting through walls, he can rip someone apart fast with exploit weakness. Also has good defense which is what most melee characters lack. Another strong Doom thats better played at his lower point cost. Overcosted at 150.
